item.title: Blogging - another attempt
item.author: larry@wapnitsky.com (Larry G. Wapnitsky)
item.description: Yes, again, trying to blog. I changed the platform I’m using, and was able to copy over the old posts, but the dates are incorrect, and images are currently missing. That’s a plan for the future. In the meantime, I’m REALLY going to try my best

item.title: I'm back to blogging
item.author: larry@wapnitsky.com (Larry G. Wapnitsky)
item.description: It’s been a while since I’ve worked on my blog, but there’s no better time than now to refresh the way it looks and to start writing again.
